item.description:
@jaruanna wrote:

theres a bracket that you need to get rid of right here:

Everytime you use an opening bracket, you have to close it. You have 3 opening but 4 closing.

item.title: What's Wrong with this code?
item.dc:creator: @Owner_satan Owner satan
item.description:
@Owner_satan wrote:

Okay I just have a quick question, should be very simple to answer but I just can’t seem to figure out whats wrong with this part of the code.
This is for a chest that when opened gives any random item in the game. However, I don’t want anyone getting special items like the pring for example. So what I did is i tried to modify it, but I get 100 errors when compiling. I know I’m missing a bracket most likely but I just don’t know where it goes. So here is my code:

[code=java] case 75:
if (c.rnPoints > 0 && c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 1) {
int ranitem = Misc.random(20082) - 10;
if (c.rnPoints > 0 && c.getItems().freeSlots() >= 1 && ranitem = 773);
c.getItems().deleteItem(773, c.getItems().getItemSlot(773), 1);
c.getItems().addItem(995, 150000000);
c.rnPoints -= 1;
c.sendMessage("<col=3589><img=2>Lmao you got A pring, but your not allowed to have this so you get 150m instead.");
} else {
c.getItems().addItem(ranitem, 1);
c.rnPoints -= 1;
c.getDH().sendDialogues(38, 945);

} else {
c.getDH().sendDialogues(39, 945); }
}

break;[/code]
Thanks for your time and Thanks in advance.

Read full topic
